name: Flammer's Life
description:
Programming -> craer - link

Game design, art and assets -> burakcetn - link

A game where you choose the best bet in order to survive three tyrants' unrelenting gambling requests. You pay and cheat in the football matches in order to fulfill the requests.

First, click on the phone to open the scoreboard. Then, write down the desired scores to get the maximum possible bet outcome. Finally, press the button to earn the profit.

You have 30 seconds to finish the round, and also you have to finish 8 rounds. 

You don't want to miss a round -week in game- without earning money, so be careful and good luck!  Tyrants' are impatient...

Played with mouse and keyboard.
